title:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - 446°F Heat Resistant,Turner Tongs,Spatula,Spoon,Brush,Whisk,Wooden Handles Pink Kitchen Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware;
BPA Free, heat-resistant, non-melting, wooden handle, easy to clean
descriptions:
**Product Title:** oannao 14-Piece Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set with Wooden Handles

**Product Description:**

Upgrade your kitchen with the oannao 14-Piece Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set, designed to make cooking and serving a breeze. This comprehensive set includes:

- Deep Soup Ladle
- Solid Serving Spoon
- Slotted Spoon
- Slotted Turner
- Turner
- Food Tongs
- Pasta Server
- Flexible Spatula
- Basting Brush
- Whisk
- Round Spatula Turner
- Large Skimmer Spoon
- Small Silicone Spatula
- Utensil Holder

**Key Features:**

- **BPA-Free and Food Grade:** Made from high-quality, food-grade silicone with a stainless steel core for durability and safety.
- **Heat Resistant:** Can withstand temperatures up to 446°F (230°C), perfect for cooking and serving hot dishes.
- **Comfortable Wooden Handles:** Ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip and prevents heat transfer.
- **One-Piece Design:** No gaps or crevices, making cleaning and maintenance a breeze.
- **Easy to Clean:** Simply wash with soap and water, but please note that these utensils are not dishwasher safe.
- **Suitable for Nonstick Cookware:** Gentle on nonstick surfaces and won't scratch or damage your cookware.

**Important Instructions:**

- Before first use, please soak the utensils in water for 30 minutes and let them air dry for 3 hours to remove the original silica gel smell.

**Customer Support:**

At oannao, we pride ourselves on excellent customer service. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. We respond to all inquiries within 12 hours.

**Order Your oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set Today and Upgrade Your Kitchen Experience!**
